TopicTitle: Im new to the game and i want some help

Articles.Content:
I downloaded this game 1 hour ago, and all i made is a space shuttle using the solid rockets.

My main question is: Why other ppl's ships got ALOOOOT more of parts? help plz
Hi! You can find more parts in the Addon section of the forum.

Sunday Punch made some parts in a pack, it's a good beginning:

http://victorbjelkholm.se/ksp/Sunday_Punchs_KSP_parts_v1_04.zip

I downloaded this game 1 hour ago, and all i made is a space shuttle using the solid rockets.

My main question is: Why other ppl's ships got ALOOOOT more of parts? help plz

Are you in SANDBOX or CAREER mode? If in career mode, you need to unlock parts using the science points. If you are in sandbox mode, you have access to all stock parts. You can also download mod to add more to sandbox mode.

download NovaPunch if you want a slightly easier progression...it adds lots more parts, even for Career mode. if you are doing career mode, make sure to do science, recover your ships (and Kerbalnauts) and spend points wisely... For planetary orbital transfers, search youtube for videos on how to do asparagus or onion engine configurations...

and dont forget to save good sub-assemblies !!!
Toomuchbrew and jduchock, it was kind of you to want to help, but it seems you didn't notice the date on the original post. (How did you even FIND this?)

I know how. I was looking at the forums on my droid. I hit the right arrow (thinking it would bring me to the next page) and it put me all the way back to the oldest forum thread page. Wow. My face is as red as Duna. Thank you for properly trolling me. On a side note: new people to the forums would find it somewhat useful, albiet, dated.
Are there any moderators that close old threads?
